groups.title: UVAVANYO LOKUQONDA

questions.text: Funda esi sicatshulwa singezantsi uze uphendule imibuzo elandelayo.
questions.scenario:
ISICATSHULWA A

UKHENKETHO OLUKONGELA IMALI

1 Ungabuza nawuphi na umkhenkethi uza kukuxelela ukuba uMzantsi Afrika lelinye lamazwe amahle ehlabathini. Unenkqubo ekuthiwa yi'Sho't Left ekhuthaza abemi beli ukuba bangayi kwamanye amazwe koko baqwalasele ukwahluka okumangalisayo eli lizwe elinako. Cinga ngaphaya kweKapa, iRhawuti kunye naseThekwini. UMzantsi Afrika uneGarden Route entle kakhulu, uMntla Koloni onesibhakabhaka esinesihota esigcwele ziinkwenkwezi kwakunye neentaba zokhahlamba zaseMpumalanga ezingakwenza ungawuvali umlomo. Ngokwale nkqubo yeSho't Left awusebenzisi mali ininzi koko uxhasa nezoqoqosho zeli utsho ubone iindawo kunye nabanye abantu abangabakhenkethi kweli.

2 Ukuba uthanda ukukhenkethela phesheya kumazwe afana neThailand, iBali, iBintan Island yaseSingapore okanye iMauritius kufuneka ubene Visa yelizwe ngalinye. I-Visa ibiza imali eninzi. Oko kungenza uzibhaqe usebenzisa imali eninzi. Kungenjalo kungangcono ukukhenkethela ilizwekazi iMelika esemazantsi lona ukwaziyo ukuthi nge-Visa enye ukhenkethele amazwana ayo amaninzi kunokukhenkethele kumazwe anjengeBolivia wona i-Visa yawo isebenziseka kwilizwe elinye kuphela. Kaloku iMelika inako konke obuya kukufumana kumazwe akhenkethelwa nge-Visa ilizwe ngalinye. IBrazil, Chile, neArgentina yimizekelo yamazwana akwiMelika esemazantsi onokuwakhenkethela nge-Visa enye futhi ukwasebenzisa imali enye eyidola esetyenziswa yiMelika. Ungenza izinto ezonwabisayo ezifana nokuya kuphola ebhitshini ukuya kutsho kwiipati zasebusuku.

3 ULesego Matabane uMphathi wezentengiso eClub Med Southern Africa ucebisa ukuba elona thuba lilungileyo abantu abanokukhenketha ngalo kuxa kungeyoholide kuba amaxabiso ayehla, batsho baphephe nomndilili. Utsho esithi ukukhenketha xa kungeyoholide kukwakunika ithuba lokuzipholela wedwa kwiiresort, uziphumlele kakuhle.

4 Kwiinkqubo ezininzi ezincedisa ukucwangcisa ihambo yakho, ISTA Travel yenye yazo. Yona inenkqubo ebizwa ngokuba yiFlexi Fares. Le nkqubo inceda ukuba ubani akwazi ukuhlawulela inqwelomoya, ukhenketho okanye amaxabiso eeholide ngokuthi ahlawule ngezavenge. Ivumela ukuba umntu aqale ngedipozithi engama-R250,00 ubuncinane, ze amane ukuyibhatala eshiyekileyo ade ayigqibe phambi kwexesha lokuhamba. Ngoko ke ubani uyasinda ekubhataleni imali eninzi ngexesha elinye. Kananjalo, akuba umkhenkethi ebhalisile waza wakhupha le mali yedipozithi ubanenyhweba yokuba ixabiso lingaguquki nokuba amandla erandi ehlile kuba oko akumchaphazeli. ISTA Travel ikwanazo neenkqubo ezininzi zokusebenza phesheya. Uninzi lwezi nkqubo lunesithintelo seminyaka yobudala, ezinye zifikelela kuma-44 eminyaka. Ezinye zazo zifuna abathathinxaxheba babe nemfundo enomsila kwakunye namava omsebenzi ngeli xesha ezinye zifuna nje isatifikethi seMatriki.

5 Kukwakho nenkqubo ebizwa ngokuba kukuvolontiya okanye ukusebenza ngeli xesha ukhenketha. Kungakunceda ukuba wonge imali ngokuthi ungayihlawuleli indawo yokuhlala okanye izidlo. Ithuba lokukhenketha ihlabathi likwenza udibane nabahlobo abatsha, ufumane amava okusebenza phesheya ude uhlawulwe umvuzo. Ukufumana uze wonge imali yamanye amazwe yinzuzo enkulu leyo. Kwiwebhusayithi enjengevoluntourism.org okanye iproject-abroad.org ungafumana uluhlu lwamathuba okukunceda uqale kwakunye nezinto ezibalulekileyo ekufuneka uzenze ngaphambi kokuba ucebe ukhenketho lwakho.

6 Ngoncedo lweteknoloji abakhenkethi bayakwazi ukubhalisa kwiindawo zokutya ezisestayileni, ukudibana nabantu abatsha, okanye ukwabelana ngabakufumeneyo kumakhasi onxibelelwano. Ukukhula kwetekhnoloji kubanika ithuba lokukhetha into abayifunayo, xa befuna ukuyenza ngelona xabiso lihle. IiApps ezinjengeSkyScanner zinceda ukuzingela iinqwelomoya ezinamaxabiso aphantsi. IAirbnb ingakunika amava okuhlala ngokungathi usekhaya kanti iUber ingakuhambisa kwizixeko eziqikelelwa kuma-600 ehlabathini. IGoogle Maps zikunika ithuba lokugcina imephu zikwakubonisa apho ukhoyo ngeli xesha uGoogle Translate ekunceda ukuba ubuze imibuzo ngolwimi ongakwaziyo ukuluthetha okanye ufumane okuninzi ngemali yakho.

questions.text: Xela ukuba uzibalula ngantoni uMzantsi Afrika ehlabathini.
Ikhuthaza ntoni inkqubo i'Sho't Left'?
Khankanya ibeNYE indawo enobuhle obumangalisayo ngokwalo mhlathi.
Nika uncedo lwenkqubo iSho't Left kwipokotho yomkhenkethi.
Chaza isizathu sokuba kubengcono ukuhambela eMelika kunokuhambela amazwe afana nooThailand.
Khetha impendulo echanekileyo kwezi: Imali esetyenziswa kwilizwe lasemazantsi eMelika ...
Caphula isivakalisi esingqina ukuba ukukhenketha xa ingeloxesha leeholide kulungile.

Nika intsingiselo eziswa sisakhi u'zi' obhalwe ngqindilili kwisivakalisi esingezantsi.

'... kukwakunika ithuba lokuzipholela wedwa kwiiresort, uziphumlele kakuhle.'
Xela uncedo lwenkqubo iFlexi Fares kubakhenkethi.
Kukuthini ukubhatala ngezavenge?
Ngqina ukuba ukubekwa kwemiqathango yobudala yinkqubo yakwaSTA Travel yingcinga ethambekele calanye.
Nika intsingiselo yegama elibhalwe ngqindilili kulo mhlathi.
Chaza okuphuhliswa ligama 'likwenza' kwisivakalisi esikrwelelwe umgca ngaphantsi.
Matanisa uhlobo lwetekhnoloji kukhenketho olukuKHOLAM B kunye noncedo lwetekhnoloji olukuKHOLAM A.

column_a_items.text: Zinika ithuba lokugcina imephu zibonise nendawo okuyo
column_a_items.label: (c)

questions.text: Ingaba lungaluncedo kubakhenkethi ulwazi olukwesi sicatshulwa? Xhasa impendulo yakho.
Funda lo mfanekiso ungezantsi uze uphendule imibuzo elandelayo.
questions.scenario:
ISICATSHULWA B: OKUBONWAYO
Visual description: Two personified characters resembling half-moons. One character on the left wears glasses and looks angry. The character on the right is holding a lit cigarette. Between them is a sign showing a crossed-out cigarette (No Smoking). At the bottom, text reads: 'MAN NDIZIVA NDIFUNA UKUNYHASHA ILUNGELO LOMNTU NGALO MZUZU!'

questions.text: Nika intsingiselo yophawu oluphakathi kwabantu abakulo mfanekiso.
Umzobi usenze njani isimntwiso esibonakala kulo mfanekiso?
Bhala isilumkiso osinika abantu malunga nokutshaya wakuba ufunde lo mfanekiso.

groups.instructions: Funda esi sicatshulwa singezantsi uze uphendule imibuzo elandelayo.

groups.title: USHWANKATHELO

questions.text: Bhala isishwankathelo sibe kwimo yeengongoma ungadluli kumagama angama-70. Nombola izivakalisi zakho ukusuka ku-1 ukuya ku-7. Sebenzisa izivakalisi ezipheleleyo ukubhala iingongoma. Sebenzisa AMAZWI AKHO kangangoko unako.
questions.scenario:
ISICATSHULWA C

YIBA NEWEBHUSAYITHI KWISHISHINI LAKHO

Abantu abaninzi bazifumana kwi-intanethi iinkcukacha ezibhekiselele kumashishini. Yiyiphi eyona ndlela ilula nexhaphakileyo yokufumana iivenkile nezinye iinkonzo kumntu ofikayo kwidolophu okanye kwisixeko esitsha? Kukusebenzisa uGoogle! Sesi sizathu kanye esinokubangela ukuba ishishini lakho libe newebhusayithi. 

Iwebhusayithi inceda abantu, ngakumbi abafikayo endaweni, ukuba bazifumane lula iinkcukacha zamashishini abawafunayo. Oku kubalulekile kuba umntu okwindawo angayiqhelanga akanalwazi ngamashishini afumaneka kuyo.

Iwebhusayithi iyaliqaqambisa ishishini lakho kuba inika abathengi iinkcukacha ezizeleyo ngalo kwaye zifikelela lula kubo. Iinkcukacha ezifunyanwa kumakhadana oosomashishini aziziphuhlisi ngokupheleleyo iinkonzo zeshishini. 

Unxibelelwano ngewebhusayithi luhlala luvulekile ngamaxesha onke ukuphendula imibuzo yabantu ngeshishini lakho. Oko kunceda nabantu abaxakekileyo ukuze bazifumane iinkcukacha zalo nanini na. Ukuphendula imibuzo yabathengi ngomnxeba kuchitha ixesha.

Iwebhusayithi ikutsalela abathengi abathi beqhagamshelana neshishini babe sebesithathile isigqibo sokulixuma! Abantu abaninzi baqala ngokuzingela ulwazi kwi-intanethi phambi kokuba benze imigudu yokuqhagamshelana neshishini. Abathengi basoloko benolwazi ngenkonzo oyithengisayo.

Iwebhusayithi yeshishini inceda ukuba abathengi bakuthembe kuba zivela zonke iinkcukacha ezibalulekileyo ngobume beshishini. Umzekelo, luyavela ulwazi ngempumelelo yalo, imifanekiso neenkcukacha ngemveliso okanye inkonzo oyithengisayo.

Kukuthatha ithutyana elingangeyure ukutshintsha zonke iinkcukacha zeshishini lakho kwiwebhusayithi, xa kuthelekiswa nezinye iindlela zokubhengeza. Umzekelo, ukutshintsha iinkcukacha ezixhonywe kwiibhilbhodi, eziqulethe ulwazi ngedilesi, abasebenzi abafikayo nabahambayo kungakuthatha ixesha elide. 

Iwebhusayithi ifikelela kuninzi lwabantu ehlabathini jikelele ngentlawulo engephi kunokusebenzisa ezinye iindlela zokubhengeza. Kunjalo nje, akudleki kuba akukho zintlawulo zakuprinta nakuthumela.

Lilonke, ukubanewebhusayithi kwishishini lakho kukutsalela uninzi lwabaxhasi kwingingqi ohlala kuyo nakwihlabathi liphela ungadlekanga kuyaphi. Kwaye kukwenzela ubomi lula.

groups.instructions: Funda isicatshulwa C esingezantsi uze ubhale iingongoma oza kuzisebenzisa xa unika intetho koosomashishini malunga nendlela okunokunceda ngayo ukuba newebhusayithi kwishishini lakho.

groups.title: ISIBHENGEZO-NTENGISO

questions.text: Xela ukuba ipronutro ityiwa ngeliphi ixesha lemini ngokwale ntengiso.
questions.scenario:
ISICATSHULWA D
An advertisement for ProNutro. Image shows a stack of smooth balanced stones. On top of the stack is a box of ProNutro Whole Wheat cereal. Text: '100 % PERFECTLY BALANCED!', 'Ntingela emajukujukwini ngokuzifumanela isidlo sakusasa esinazo zonke izakhamzimba ozidingayo!', 'Ulindeni? Zifumanele eyakho kwiivenkile eziphambili zokutya eMzantsi Afrika!'

questions.text: Nika isilogani sale mveliso.
Xela indawo efumaneka kuyo le mveliso.
Chonga ibinzana elisetyenziselwe ukuqhatha abathengi kwesi sibhengezo ntengiso.
Khetha impendulo echanekileyo kwezi zilandelayo. Le mveliso inezakhamzimba ...
Chaza isizathu sokuba le mveliso ibekwe phezu kwamatye acunjiweyo kwesi sibhengezo-ntengiso.
Ingaba le ntengiso ijolise ekuncedeni (umnini-mveliso/umthengi)? Xhasa impendulo yakho.

groups.instructions: Funda esi sibhengezo-ntengiso uze uphendule imibuzo elandelayo.

groups.title: IKHATHUNI

questions.text: Xela indawo abancokola bekuyo aba bantu bakule khathuni.
questions.scenario:
ISICATSHULWA E
Cartoon showing an elderly man (Utatomkhulu) with a telescope looking at the night sky where a crescent moon is visible. An elderly woman (Umhakhulu) is standing behind him. 
Text bubbles: 
Utatomkhulu: 'Ukukhanya kwale nyanga kuwakhanyisa abemahle oku kwamaso amazinyo akho!'
Umhakhulu: 'Hayi bo! Uncoma ubuhle bamazinyo kaNomso kum? Yeyiphi le nyanga ubumbuka amazinyo ngayo? Oh! nguMeyi!'

questions.text: Yiyiphi into ebubungqina bokuba utatomkhulu uyamthanda umhakhulu?
Nika iintsingiselo EZIMBINI ezahlukileyo zegama 'inyanga' ezivela kule ncoko.
Khetha impendulo echanekileyo kwezi zilandelayo. Isikhuzo 'Hayi bo!' esikwintetho kamhakhulu sibonisa:
Ingaba ityhila ntoni ngesigama le khathuni?
Uyavumelana noluvo lokuba intetho kamhakhulu yintetho egweba phambi kokuba uve? Xhasa impendulo yakho.

groups.instructions: Funda le khathuni uze uphendule imibuzo elandelayo.

groups.title: IPROZI & UMFANEKISO

questions.text: Funda esi sicatshulwa uze uphendule imibuzo ebuzwe kuso.
questions.scenario:
ISICATSHULWA F

Yaqokelelwa imali msinyane yema indlu yesikolo, nezindlu zangasese ngephanyazo. Ginya iintliziyo zabantu osebenza nabo ukuze impumelelo ibesentendeni yesandla sakho. Waqala phantsi umfo kaNqatha yakuba imi indlu, wacanda iindledlana zeenyawo nezeemoto zaphahlwa ziiheji, akaze afune kubona matye amhlophe aza kukhubekisa abantwana badumbe iinyheke, izilonda phantsi kweenyawo nokusikeka kweminwe. Saqala kaloku esi sikolo saliziko lempucuko lenene, sayeka ukutsitsitheka sixele umlilo weenkuni ezimanzi.

Lo mfana kaNqatha akaphelelanga ekulungiseni imihlaba yesikolo kuphela. Watsheleza, wabila esoma phambi kwabantwana bebanga lesithandathu. Abantwana besikolo babesithi ukumbiza nguWagaxaza, ibe ilali isithi ukumbiza ngunonqane wejojo, kuba wayezigaxela emsebenzini engazoyikiseli.

questions.text:
Bhala kwakhona esi sivakalisi silandelayo sibe kwisininzi.

Yaqokelelwa imali msinyane yema indlu yesikolo.
Nika igama lemboleko endaweni yeli binzana 'nezindlu zangasese'.

Nika udidi lwesichazi olubhalwe ngqindilili kwesi sivakalisi silandelayo.

Akaze afune kubona matye amhlophe.
Chonga isibizo esingenaceba kwisivakalisi esibhalwe ngqindilili kwisicatshulwa uchaze nesizathu soko.

Ntsingiselo ni eziswa sisimamva u â€“ana esikrwelelwe umgca kwesi sivakalisi silandelayo.

Aza kukhubekisa abantwana badumbe iinyheke.

Bhala kwakhona esi sivakalisi silandelayo ufake iimpawu zobhalo ezichanekileyo.

nguWagaxazalo, yatsho ilali

Bhala izivumelanisi ngendlela echanekileyo kwesi sivakalisi silandelayo.

UNqatha akabafuni amatye siqatywe mhlophe.

Xela ukuba isenzi esikrwelelwe umgca ngaphantsi sikwimo evumayo okanye sikwimo elandulayo.

Wayezigaxela emsebenzini engazoyikiseli.
Funda lo mfanekiso uze uphendule imibuzo elandelayo.
questions.scenario:
ISICATSHULWA G: UMFANEKISO
An image of a mother cheetah/leopard caring for a small deer. Text: 'UTHANDO LOBUZALI LUGUQULA OKUNINZI. LUYAMANGALISA.'

questions.text:
Bhala kwakhona esi sivakalisi silandelayo isenzi sibe kwisixando sokwenziwa.

Uthando lobuzali luguqula okuninzi.

Landelelanisa ngokuchanekileyo amagama akwesi sivakalisi silandelayo.

Esitya sasendle ingwe ezinye sisilo.
Bhala isaci ngegama 'ingwe'.

groups.instructions: Funda esi sicatshulwa uze uphendule imibuzo ebuzwe kuso.
